DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject male IC user able selfcatheterise 2 . Subject use hydrophiliccoated ICs least 1 month 3 . Subject least 18 year old . 4 . Subject provide informed consent . 1 . Subject symptom UTI ( ie , fever , autonomic dysreflexia , spasticity , discomfort pain kidney bladder , onset/increase incontinence episode , cloudy urine increase odour , malaise , lethargy , sense unease ) . 2 .
